thread.title: Rhossili Bay named in UK's top ten beaches | Wales
thread.title_full: Rhossili Bay named in UK's top ten beaches | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Rhossili Bay named in UK's top ten beaches | Wales
text:
Rhossili Bay has been named in the UK's best beaches by travel website 'Trip Advisor'.
Rhossili Beach has 3 miles of sand and coastline Credit: Trip Advisor It's the most westerly bay on the Gower Peninsula and bears the full might of the Atlantic swells.
That makes it a popular beach with surfers of all abilities with the biggest waves at the north end at Llangennith.
Credit: Trip Advisor Last year, it was named as Britain's fourth best beach, by the travel website.
Weymouth Beach in Dorest was named the UK's best rated and in the top 10 in Europe,
Top 10 beaches in the UK voted for by TripAdvisor:
1. Weymouth Beach, Weymouth, Dorset 2. Fistral Beach, Newquay, Cornwall 3. St. Brelade's Bay Beach, St Brelade, Jersey 4. Luskentyre, Isle of Harris, Scotland 5. Woolacombe Beach, Woolacombe, Devon 6. Porthminster Beach, St Ives, Cornwall 7. Bournemouth Beach, Bournemouth, Dorset 8. Rhossili Bay, Rhossili, Wales 9. Perranporth Beach, Perranporth, Cornwall 10. Hengistbury Head, Bournemouth, Dorset Last updated Wed 22 Feb 2017 Travel South Wales Wales
